body.name: Baby Trend Sit N Stand Easy Fold Double Baby Stroller and Single Infant Car Seat Travel System with Safety Harnesses and Cover, Magnolia
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 21 - 23. Order within 9 hrs 53 mins.
features: Car Seat Stroller Combos from Baby Trend: Features a bundle that includes 1 Infant and Toddler Sit N Stand Double Twin Stroller and 1 Car Seat; Convertible stroller with front and rear seats
Baby Trend Stroller Security: Equipped with a 5-point comforting child restraint safety harness; Buckle the toddler car seat harness with 1 hand and use push-button release to unbuckle
Travel Stroller Cup Holders: Features a covered parent tray with 2 built-in cup holders to hold phones, keys, beverages, and other essentials; Convenient toddler wagon stroller for small storage
Wagon Stroller Protection: Includes a sun-protected canopy and foot-activated rear brake for stabilization; Baby car seat is made for infants that weigh between 4 to 35 pounds and below 32 inches
Baby Stroller and Car Seat Combo Accessories: Equipped with a large storage basket under the stroller wagon; Due to size order will ship in multiple boxes and may not all arrive on the same day
body.description: The Baby Trend Sit N' Stand Double Stroller and Car Seat bundle is the ideal solution for making family on-the-go travel seamless. This versatile wagon for kids has multiple seating options that can accommodate up to 2 Baby Trend infant car seats by quickly clicking them directly into the child's tray. The front seat of the baby wagon has a removable 2-panel fully ratcheting canopy, and the rear seat of the infant stroller has a fixed canopy with visors to block the sun. Including a hassle-free 1 hand fold, an extra-large basket for all your traveling necessities, and a parent console with 2 cup holders with a covered compartment, you'll be able to travel with everything you need with this stroller and carseat combo set for a great day. For little ones weighing up to 35 pounds and 32 inches long, the infant car seat or booster car seat features a 5-point safety harness with a simple 1-hand adjustment and push-button release, 4-position height adjustment, and a height-adjustable seat back for a secure and snug fit. The car seat and stroller combo cater to a wide age range, from newborns to toddlers, making it an excellent choice for growing families. Ensure your child's ultimate safety while traveling and keep them secure with the Double Baby Stroller with Single Car Seat from Baby Trend.

Next page 1 Anti-Rebound Protection 2 Canopy 3 5-Point Safety Harness 4 Cozy Cover

The Baby Trend Ally 35 Infant Car Seat provides the latest innovations in safety, design and comfort. This infant car seat has a 35 pound maximum infant weight rating and comes equipped with a deluxe seat pad and reversible infant insert. For added security, Ally 35 is engineered with higher, deeper side wings with EPS foam for optimal side impact protection. Other safety features include a 5-point safety harness with one-hand adjustment, a 4-position height adjustable base with dual bubble level indicators and a 6-position crotch belt adjustment.
4-position height adjustable base with dual bubble level indicators

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My daughter loves it!
reviews.reviewText: The only thing is that when it was shipped, it never said it was coming in two packages! So the first one arrived -being the stroller part, and the car seat the next day

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2023

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like it
reviews.reviewText: Love this stroller the review would have been higher if I could fit it in my Elantra’s trunk maybe I’m not folding it right but I’m pretty sure I am and it’s still huge folded so if you have an suv or van I’m sure you can take it with you but I can’t and that kinda sucks but it is good to take around the block and walking to the park

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Love both the stroller and car seat, I’d say the only negative thing is the bottom clip on the buckle of the car seat is a little annoying to clip since both sides have to be clipped at the same time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DEFECTIVE, CHEAPLY MADE, BUYER BEWARE, POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this stroller back in February as a GIFT. The baby wasn't born until April. They go to use the stroller for the first time on 6/9, since the baby is big enough now, and the stroller is DEFECTIVE. It does not latch when it is fully opened and is missing screws. Now Spreetail, the seller, is refusing to do anything to remedy this situation. I would choose a company that has more compassion for PARENTS spending their HARD EARNED MONEY on their DEFECTIVE, CHEAPLY MADE PRODUCTS.
